name: Mage Defense
description:
FOR SOME REASON, THE BACKGROUND MUSIC ONLY WORK ON THE DOWNLOADED VERSION (on the bottom of this page)

The game

Mix between "Plants vs Zombies" and an action-rpg, "Mage Defense" is a game where you control a mage which had to defend a magic portal against waves of monsters using your spells!

You can move the move in the four directions on the grid and shoot fireballs to destroy yours enemies. There are 4 differents spells, and 6 differents enemies, with their own features!

Control

Arrow keys : movements

Space : shoot

F : activate spell

Credits

Musics by Evan King - Enchiridion - End This, This Will Destroy Us :
https://breakingcopyright.com/artist/evan-king

Font : VCR OSD https://www.dafont.com/vcr-osd-mono.font
